title: FT Health: Vaccines
description: Vaccine research grows vigorously, propelled by rising world demand to fight existing diseases and to guard against new threats.
cleaned_text: FT Health: Vaccines Vaccine research grows vigorously, propelled by rising world demand to fight existing diseases and to guard against new threats. Ebola and Zika have recently caused huge international alarm. Yet the Trump era may give voice to increased vaccine scepticism
